title: 95/179/EC: Commission Decision of 15 May 1995 amending Decision 94/448/EC laying down special conditions governing imports of fishery and aquaculture products originating in New Zealand (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 15 May 1995 amending Decision  94/448/EC laying down special conditions governing imports of fishery and aquaculture products  originating in New Zealand (Text with EEA relevance) (95/179/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF  THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex B of Decision 94/448/EC is replaced by the Annex to this  Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 May 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
ANNEX
